name: The Void Sand Witch Searches for the Oasis
name_original: The Void Sand Witch Searches for the Oasis
description:
Controls:

Press left mouse button to shoot voids.

Hold Down the left mouse button and release when the witch's sprite changes to shoot fireballs.

Fireballs burn shields and bullets.

GAME MADE FOR BUTTERSCOTCH SHENANIJAMS 2018

Play as The Void Sand Witch as she traverses a desert to find her friend in the oasis. But monsters will get in the way.

Send the monsters to the nether by shooting voids at them.

Burn their shields and bullets by holding down or tapping down the left mouse button or your screen and then letting go.

But be careful, your fires are limited ~

How it fits the theme(s):

Void Sandwich : You play as a witch who shoots out voids and traverses a sandy desert.

Sticky Justice : You shoot fire and voids through a magical stick.

Burn it down : You burn shields, cactuses and bullets with your fire magic

Achievements (hopefully) Unlocked:

- Gameboy

- Mozart

- One Punch Man

- Maverick
